---
title: "Introduction to Statistics Using Excel"
author: "Andrew Parnell"
output: html_document
---

A two day course on introductory statistics using Excel. The syllabus is:

- Graphical and tabular summaries of data
- Basics of experimental design
- Probability distributions
- Hypothesis testing
- Confidence intervals
- t-tests
- Linear regression
- ANOVA and F-tests
- Control charts
